name: HDFC Ergo Easy Health
provider: HDFC ERGO General Insurance Co. Ltd

clauses.text: Critical illness coverage includes cancer, CABG, heart attack, stroke, kidney failure with no waiting period
Cumulative bonus increases sum insured without premium increase for claim-free years
Day care treatment means less than 24 hours hospitalization due to technological advancement
Domiciliary care covered when hospital treatment not available or patient unfit to move
Hospitalization means admission for more than 24 hours unless day care procedure
Medical expenses must be reasonable, medically necessary, and verified by medical practitioner
AYUSH hospitals must meet government standards same as allopathic hospitals
Co-payment means insured bears part of medical expenses as per policy terms
Deductible amount applies before claim payment is processed by insurance company
Accident means sudden, external, visible, violent event causing bodily injury
Waiting period of 90 days applies for knee surgery and joint replacement procedures
Eye surgery including cataract covered after 30 days waiting period
Pre-existing diseases covered after 48 months continuous coverage
Maternity benefits available after 36 months waiting period
Annual health check-up covered up to specified limit without deductible
